Extraskeletal osteosarcoma     Treatment of extraskeletal osteosarcoma may include the following:               -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor, followed by chemotherapy.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.
